ing: 1 pound peeled and deveined medium shrimp (30-40 per pound)
2 small serrano peppers, seeded and minced
des:
"Ceviche is a wonderful seafood salad marinated in lime juice. This is a recipe that is better the longer it sits. It is best done the day before and allowed to 'cook' in the lime juice overnight.
"
ins: Combine the shrimp, scallops, cilantro, tomatoes, celery, green onions, lime juice, and serrano peppers in a bowl. Season with salt, white pepper, and black pepper; stir and pour into a glass or plastic container. Cover, and refrigerate 3 hours to overnight. Serve the seafood with the lime juice marinade.
